articles.title: Firm raises $296m Africa Tech fund - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Convergence Partners, the leading private equity investor dedicated to the technology sector across sub-Saharan Africa, said it has successfully raised $296 million Convergence Partners Digital Infrastructure Fund surpassing its initial target by over 18%.
